suppress.notes: The CVE is for the the artifact commons-beanutils:commons-beanutils:1.9.2. The actual artifact pulled in by the Geotools dependencies has a classifier "noclassprop". It is a special version of the JAR file that disabled the ability for an attacker to access the classloader via the class property. The actual filename of the modified JAR is "commons-beanutils-1.9.2-noclassprop.jar". If the Geotools updates its dependencies to version 1.9.4 of the artifact, this suppression may be removed because version 1.9.4 and higher are not vulnerable.
